title: Elisha Prophesies and Hazael Rises
summary: Elisha tells the Shunammite woman to leave during a famine. He later weeps as he prophesies that Hazael will become king of Syria and harm Israel. Meanwhile, King Jehoram of Judah rules wickedly, and Ahaziah becomes king after him.

faq.question: Why did Elisha weep when speaking to Hazael?
faq.answer: Because he foresaw the terrible things Hazael would do to Israel.

faq.question: What did Elisha predict about Hazael?
faq.answer: That he would become king of Syria and bring great suffering.
